description:
A+C: add Mats Lidell.  He signed the agreement with the Sweden email
address, but his changelist is under the Gmail address.

messages.text:
LGTM

You can just put

A+C: Mats Lidell (individual CLA)

for the description. Having two email addresses is common enough

Please remove the gmail.com address from the AUTHORS file.
It only needs to be in the CONTRIBUTORS file (where it has a
semantic meaning).

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

done, thanks

On Wed, May 30, 2012 at 2:34 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> You can just put
>
> A+C: Mats Lidell (individual CLA)
>
> for the description. Having two email addresses is common enough
>
> Please remove the gmail.com address from the AUTHORS file.
> It only needs to be in the CONTRIBUTORS file (where it has a
> semantic meaning).
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=700728feacc8 ***

A+C: add Mats Lidell.  He signed the agreement with the Sweden email
address, but his changelist is under the Gmail address.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6248069
